fact: Did you know? Short-term memory can hold about 7 items for around 20 seconds.
Did you know? People tend to mimic the body language of those they like or trust.
Did you know? Smiling can actually improve your mood by releasing endorphins.
Did you know? Children learn languages faster during early development due to brain plasticity.
Did you know? Chronic stress can shrink the hippocampus, affecting memory and learning.
Did you know? The human brain uses around 20% of your total energy even at rest.
Did you know? People are more likely to conform to group opinions even if they’re wrong.
Did you know? Personality traits like openness and conscientiousness are stable across life.
Did you know? The confirmation bias makes people favor information that matches their beliefs.
Did you know? People are more likely to remember unusual or funny facts.
Did you know? Visual memory is often stronger than auditory memory in most people.
Did you know? Habits form through repetition, taking an average of 66 days to become automatic.
Did you know? Listening to music can trigger the release of dopamine, the 'feel-good' hormone.
Did you know? Adolescents experience heightened emotional sensitivity due to brain development.
Did you know? Poor sleep can increase the risk of depression and anxiety.
Did you know? Neuroplasticity allows the brain to rewire itself after injury or new learning.
Did you know? People tend to overestimate how much others notice their mistakes, a phenomenon called the spotlight effect.
